definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: An approach of grading fertile eggs based on computer vision was presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種利用計算機視覺對種蛋進行篩選的方法。

sentences.english: The wave form of each main physical quantities are drawn by computer.
sentences.chinese: 還利用計算機繪圖畫出了各主要物理量的波形圖。

sentences.english: You can't build a reputation on what you are going to do.
sentences.chinese: 你不可以用計畫如何做來建立個人聲譽。

sentences.english: Therefore, many experts and scholars try resolving Timetabling Problem using computer.
sentences.chinese: 因此，衆多專家學者嘗試利用計算機來解決排課問題。

sentences.english: Certainly, external memory is needed, when the computer is used.
sentences.chinese: 利用計算機求解時無疑要藉助於外存儲器。

sentences.english: The expert system for vibrating ore-drawing shaft is designed using computer.
sentences.chinese: 利用計算機手段設計實現了振動出礦溜井專家系統。

sentences.english: In "Jack and the Beanstalk" Jack play a trick on the ogre to keep from being eaten.
sentences.chinese: 在“傑克與魔豆”中，傑克用計纔沒被食人魔獸喫掉。

sentences.english: Sea mixed wave and disturb signal may be simulated by computer.
sentences.chinese: 利用計算機也可以模擬產生海雜波和干擾信號。

sentences.english: Ye Lingqing finally maneuver from Zhang Yunai stole the passport.
sentences.chinese: 葉凌青終於用計從張雲愛那裏竊取了通行證。

sentences.english: People equdined on success in life with the proficiency of operating computer .
sentences.chinese: 人們把會利用計算機與人生樂成混爲一談。

sentences.english: Evil Scholar, you trapped my dad in te duel.
sentences.chinese: 奪命書生，當年你用計打贏了我爹。

sentences.english: Tell me something…do you always set up your fights?
sentences.chinese: 告訴我，你總是用計來使人決鬥嗎？

sentences.english: Automated Face Recognition (AFR) is one of the most challenging tasks for computer vision and pattern recognition.
sentences.chinese: 研究了利用計算機實現的人臉自動識別方法。

sentences.english: Other researchers have used computer vision systems to observe the road.
sentences.chinese: 其他研究人員利用計算機圖像系統觀察路況。

sentences.english: People equdined on success in life with the skills of operating computer.
sentences.chinese: 人們把會利用計算機與人生樂成同日而語。

sentences.english: Clock trap dourgen to enter into a trap, DuoDuo captured.
sentences.chinese: 娜木鐘用計讓多爾袞進入陷阱，多鐸被擒。
